Improved Gouge.name: Improved Gouge
descriptions: Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by 0.5 sec.
Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by 1 sec.
Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by 1.5 sec.

Improved Sinister Strike.name: Improved Sinister Strike
descriptions: Gives you a 3% chance to land an extra Sinister Strike on the same target.
Gives you a 5% chance to land an extra Sinister Strike on the same target.

Bitter Experience.name: Bitter Experience
descriptions: Increases your Dodge chance by 1% and all resistances by 8.
Increases your Dodge chance by 2% and all resistances by 16.
Increases your Dodge chance by 3% and all resistances by 24.
Increases your Dodge chance by 4% and all resistances by 32.
Increases your Dodge chance by 5% and all resistances by 40.

Improved Backstab.name: Improved Backstab
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by 10%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by 20%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by 30%.

Deflection.name: Deflection
descriptions: Increases your Parry chance by 2%.
Increases your Parry chance by 4%.
Increases your Parry chance by 6%.

Precision.name: Precision
descriptions: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 1%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 2%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 3%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 4%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 5%.

Improved Sprint.name: Improved Sprint
descriptions: Gives a 50% chance to remove all movement impairing effects when you activate your Sprint ability and increases it's duration by 3 sec.
Gives a 100% chance to remove all movement impairing effects when you activate your Sprint ability and increases it's duration by 5 sec.

Improved Kick.name: Improved Kick
descriptions: Reduces the cost of your Kick by 10 Energy and gives it a 50% chance to silence the target for 4 seconds.
Reduces the cost of your Kick by 20 Energy and gives it a 100% chance to silence the target for 4 seconds.

Riposte.name: Riposte
descriptions: A strike that becomes active after parrying an opponent's attack.  This attack deals 150% weapon damage and disarms the target for 6 seconds.

Dual Wield Specialization.name: Dual Wield Specialization
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 10%.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 15%.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 20%.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 25%.

Close Quarters Combat.name: Close Quarters Combat
descriptions: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axe, Fist and Dagger weapons by 1%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axe, Fist and Dagger weapons by 2%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axe, Fist and Dagger weapons by 3%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axe, Fist and Dagger weapons by 4%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axe, Fist and Dagger weapons by 5%.

Physical Prowess.name: Physical Prowess
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Sprint and Evasion abilities by 1 min and increases your Strength by 25% and Stamina by 5%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Sprint and Evasion abilities by 2 min and increases your Strength by 50% and Stamina by 10%.

Mace Specialization.name: Mace Specialization
descriptions: Causes your attacks with maces to ignore up to 120(scales with your level) of your target's Armor.
Causes your attacks with maces to ignore up to 240(scales with your level) of your target's Armor.
Causes your attacks with maces to ignore up to 360(scales with your level) of your target's Armor.
Causes your attacks with maces to ignore up to 480(scales with your level) of your target's Armor.
Causes your attacks with maces to ignore up to 600(scales with your level) of your target's Armor.

Sword Specialization.name: Sword Specialization
descriptions: Gives you a 1% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.
Gives you a 2% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.
Gives you a 3% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.
Gives you a 4% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.
Gives you a 5% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.

Blade Flurry.name: Blade Flurry
descriptions: Your attacks strike an additional nearby opponent. Lasts 20 seconds.

Steadfast Determination.name: Steadfast Determination
descriptions: Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear and Charm effects by an additional 7%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear and Charm effects by an additional 14%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear and Charm effects by an additional 21%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear and Charm effects by an additional 28%.
Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear and Charm effects by an additional 35%.

Battle Rush.name: Battle Rush
descriptions: Your auto attacks have 4% chance to regain 10 energy.
Your auto attacks have 8% chance to regain 10 energy.
Your auto attacks have 12% chance to regain 10 energy.
Your auto attacks have 16% chance to regain 10 energy.
Your auto attacks have 20% chance to regain 10 energy.

Weapon Expertise.name: Weapon Expertise
descriptions: Increases your chance to parry and your attack speed by 3%.
Increases your chance to parry and your attack speed by 5%.

Aggression.name: Aggression
descriptions: Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage and Eviscerate abilities by 3%.
Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage and Eviscerate abilities by 6%.
Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage and Eviscerate abilities by 9%.
Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage and Eviscerate abilities by 12%.
Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage and Eviscerate abilities by 15%.

Adrenaline Rush.name: Adrenaline Rush
descriptions: You feeling the adrenaline, becoming immune to Fear and increasing your melee attack speed by 30% and Energy regeneration rate by 100%. Lasts 15 seconds.
